remarks: De Moivre's Formula.  Proof by induction given at ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/De_Moivre's_formula , but restricted to nonnegative integer powers.  See also ~ demoivreALT for an alternate longer proof not using the exponential function.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jul-2007.)
statement: demoivre $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ^ N ) = ( ( cos ` ( N x. A ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( N x. A ) ) ) ) ) $.
